text: 1.15: Ese 1.24; 43.2; VB 14.2Anan ŋkarveni ŋgarav, mbe bras ndi vhava bakɨme khɨngim, ana shigim, mbe ana hɨvgim, ana ŋgara gari fara muuŋgi. 1.15 Mbe bras tuegap, ana tuituigiap ŋgara gari fhu. Mbe mbaram bigɨna mbe ndigap, ana shav kim, ana guigira ŋgara garav guigira vhekvhegi.  Gu anan kamthooŋ mbararagim, ana mbɨ fombai khɨkhɨm bakɨme fara muuŋgi.
